description: Discover the best hotels in Miami, United States. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Miami Downtown Hidden Gem Overlooking Biscayne Bay with Daily Breakfast Credit
hotels.description: Miami's calling and VYE Hotel is your answer. Located in the heart of the Magic City, this is your gateway to sun-drenched beaches and electric nightlife. Steps from the buzz of downtown, with sleek rooms and city skyline views, everything is designed to make your stay as smooth as a South Beach sunset. This is where your Miami dreams become reality. When hunger strikes, Biscayne Tavern and Grill dishes out bold local flavours and pours a mean mojito. Whether you're fueling up for a day of exploring Little Havana, catching a game at Kaseya Center, hopping on a cruise or just vibing with the city's tropical energy, this hotel is perfectly positioned for every adventure.

hotels.title: Historic Art Deco Miami Escape within South Beach Neighbourhood
hotels.description: Stay in the heart of Miami's buzzing South Beach neighbourhood at the heritage Art Deco Balfour Hotel Miami Beach. Built in the 1940s, this retreat provides an ambience of timeless style and nostalgic glamour surrounded by the electric vibrancy of Ocean Drive. Just steps from the golden sands of Miami Beach, and minutes away from high-end boutiques, buzzing bars, restaurants and museums, this serene escape couldn't be better placed for days spent in the sun.

hotels.title: Boutique Miami Retreat with Private Beach Area & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Embrace laidback tropical vibes at Mr C Miami Coconut Grove, a stylish boutique hotel offering stunning views of the Biscayne Bay. Step inside and be awed by the unique architecture and nautical design elements before heading up to the rooftop pool to work on your tan. When hunger strikes, visit Bellini restaurant for Italian-inspired fare or enjoy savoury snacks and refreshing cocktails poolside. If you’d rather relax with your toes in the sand, take a short stroll to the beach and set yourself up in the private area reserved for Mr C guests. When you’re not exploring Coconut Grove, indulge in a relaxing treatment at the onsite spa or simply soak in the views from your private balcony.

hotels.title: Sky-High Downtown Miami Waterside Glamour with Two Rooftop Pools
hotels.description: Playful in spirit and dripping in Miami glamour, Kimpton EPIC Hotel, an IHG Hotel, offers unparalleled access to everything that makes the ‘Magic City’ so irresistible, including golden beaches, grand Art Deco architecture and truly great nightlife. After days spent discovering the city’s best, return to two spectacular, cabana-flanked rooftop pools, a sumptuous weekend seafood brunch served sky-high at Area 31 or laidback izakaya-style plates on the waterfront at Zuma.

hotels.title: Miami Waterfront Escape on Biscayne Bay with Rooftop Pool, Cabanas & Bar
hotels.description: The glitz and glamour of Miami await at InterContinental Miami, an IHG Hotel - positioned on the downtown waterfront for the ultimate in bayside luxury. Take your time exploring the various beaches and gardens along the shoreline, before retreating for a refreshing dip in the hotel’s rooftop pool and an afternoon cocktail at Bluewater bar. Treat yourself to exquisite dining at Toro Toro, showcasing vibrant Pan-Latin cuisine, ranging from tender steaks to Peruvian ceviche.

hotels.title: Modern Miami Stay Steps from Brickell City Centre with Spanish Restaurant & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Experience the vibrancy of Miami with a stay at Hotel Indigo Miami Brickell, an IHG Hotel, just moments from the upscale boutiques of Brickell City Centre. This urban oasis is just a stone's throw from the colourful murals of Wynwood Walls and the sparkling waters of Biscayne Bay. After a day of exploration, unwind at the hotel's rooftop pool with panoramic city views, indulge in Latin-inspired dishes and a refreshing selection of beer, wine and cocktails at Mosaico Kitchen + Bar.

hotels.title: Stylish Miami Bayside Bliss with Beach Club & Spa
hotels.description: Experience energetic Miami at this uber-cool Mediterranean-inspired retreat, where coastal charm meets the city's vibrant spirit. Soak in the waterfront views at the onsite Baia Beach Club, complete with private cabanas, a bayside pool, a bar and a full-service wellness spa. Indulge with the rejuvenating sauna and keep up with your routine at the fitness centre. Whether you're there for a romantic escape or simply to relax, enjoy buzzing Miami at Mondrian South Beach.
